answer.p: A key principle in Symphony’s development philosophy is simplicity. We leave all non-essential functions out of the core system, allowing them to be re-integrated as extensions. This keeps Symphony development agile, makes the system as flexible as possible, and benefits the broadest number of users.
If the feature you’re looking for can’t be found in our extensions library, you can find out in the forum if anyone is working on it. If not, maybe you can build it!
